New Records: Sunil Chhetri became the first player to score in his 150th international match
Key Match Events: Afghanistan scored twice in the 70th and 88th minutes to secure the win
India's goal came from a penalty after a communication error leading to a red card
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan had more shots on target (12) compared to India's (7)
Afghanistan's players were largely from lower leagues and amateur teams
Post-Match Reflections: Igor Stimac, India's coach, criticized the team's lack of control and passing ability
Sunil Chhetri's goal was initially not counted due to a missed rebound but was later converted via a penalty
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan's victory was their first over India since 2019
Several Afghan players were without club contracts
